0.title: What is the difference between "px", "dip", "dp" and "sp"?
0.body:
What is the difference between Android units of measure?

  • px
  • dip
  • dp
  • sp

1.title: Close/hide the Android Soft Keyboard
1.body:
I have an EditText and a Button in my layout.

After writing in the edit field and clicking on the Button, I want to hide the virtual keyboard. I assume that this is a simple piece of code, but where can I find an example of it?

2.title: Proper use cases for Android UserManager.isUserAGoat()?
2.body:
I was looking at the new APIs introduced in Android 4.2. While looking at the UserManager class I came across the following method:

public boolean isUserAGoat()

Used to determine whether the user making this call is subject to teleportations.

Returns whether the user making this call is a goat.

How and when should this be used?
